short_description: the hair station is a hair salon based in elgin, illinois, united states.
long_description: at the hair station salon we offer four different treatments for your hair.
generated_description: the hair station is a hair salon located in elgin, il that offers four different hair treatments: cut, trim, perm, and color. cut is a process where a hairdresser shapes hair by clipping off unwanted length or changing its texture, while trim is a service that cuts the ends of hair to keep it healthy and manageable. perm is a technique used to stretch hair and place relaxers in each section, usually spaced inches apart on each side of the head. the salon recommends getting a cut at least every eight weeks to keep hair healthy and looking great.
